eba27376c6ded054.voiceContent: Most of my time I spend alone in the laboratory, researching for many hours at a time.

191b9d0483099612.voiceContent: ...Previously, I never really knew how to bring this up.

e2bc8f6693b2e94d.voiceContent: But I greatly appreciate your kindness. It means a lot.

ca182d2566f1c486.voiceContent: Small Lamp Grass or Windwheel Aster?

24d4159055fd0b00.voiceContent: Your home far exceeds my needs.

00816a77b1a16da6.voiceContent: According to my research, this secondary phenotype of Calla Lily may be beneficial for sleep quality.

823ecc6f6e41988f.voiceContent: I dried some to make a scented sachet. You can place it next to your pillow if you'd like.

bb476d6328568e4a.voiceContent: It will keep them safe until the day comes when they can adorn our very own paradise.

a691dfaa3f3cc15d.voiceContent: Mm-hmm... I'll get there, one day!

e14a4137af2b29a8.voiceContent: Oh, actually... I have a few small questions I'd like to ask you.

7de5ef86da0f7f01.voiceContent: As long as there's a dedicated laboratory, I am more than satisfied.

2d6f3178d96e3b10.voiceContent: So, for now... all I can do is place your selected objects into this crystal ball.

5d0fcd913dabcd19.voiceContent: No, no... I still don't know what would be appropriate to talk about.

9518015e11b938cb.voiceContent: Uh... I'm... not very good at making conversation.

2043e17ea8976a5e.voiceContent: Oh, uh... Please don't worry about me.

79e4b0d1d7659bfc.voiceContent: Thanks to you, my research is progressing smoothly.

eccb9f88715f87b6.voiceContent: I don't know much about what goes on in the outside world... or the kinds of things that people like to talk about...

af2c8b70960e5891.voiceContent: I thought about inviting you to my private paradise... but currently, I still lack the ability to make it a reality.

097c31a0742e6853.voiceContent: Hearing you say this makes me feel more at ease.

1dabc116306f1ce4.voiceContent: A sea of clouds or a field of flowers?

db527399810baf98.voiceContent: Oh... If it's with you, then...

96412d6fbc39f025.voiceContent: If an experiment doesn't quite go to plan, it can even end up being several days.

5ca5715d29db784a.voiceContent: I'd feel guilty to trouble you...

45dd817ef572091f.voiceContent: And, um... I don't really like to go out and socialize much, even on my days off.

4bd58f1d2391f06f.voiceContent: Just say the first answer that comes to mind. There are no right or wrong answers.

999bd1daeebf7de1.voiceContent: Are you interested? Can you... help me?

3a9ac3ddad54f621.voiceContent: Even if an experiment goes, uh, explosively wrong in here, the specimens stored in the storage cabinets shouldn't be damaged...

ebcc77e1f6adb460.voiceContent: With a little renovation, perhaps this place could be used for even more valuable research...

903269e4b82808a0.voiceContent: Huh? Wh—When did you get here? I—I mean... I've been itching to conduct this experiment... I—Is it okay if I go ahead and do it?

e05fb5d57ec1bd7e.voiceContent: A fully-equipped alchemy workshop? And arranged in a rather reasonable manner as well...

950be5c9415a56c7.voiceContent: This camp is flawless in every way. It's just a shame that there are no bones lying around...

5cc7b63f0fe0f8f4.voiceContent: Chests appearing out of thin air... This needs research.

09a444265da03d6b.voiceContent: *sigh* If only I stumbled upon lab supplies as often.

c3909765fcf0a954.voiceContent: I'm Sucrose, a researcher of alchemy. I heard you've been to a lot of places, so I was wondering if you... Ah, what am I saying! It's only our first time meeting, I shouldn't trouble you. But... if you're willing, I'd love to hear any stories you have about your adventures. I'd... really like that.

294e5b053f174c06.voiceContent: What was that? Oh... it's gone. Can I go take a look?

9992890e0b639269.voiceContent: I just need a moment to quickly take down some notes.

40806f178750b128.voiceContent: Ahhh! I haven't been out in a while.

b11e0910901c25ea.voiceContent: The windmills are spinning faster than usual today. Hey, do you think if an animal put a propeller on its back and started running... do you think the propeller would make it run faster? Or even, fly?

46d1a49d9f2ed96c.voiceContent: Humidity levels are increasing. Think we could run some tests?

da0ae454ba863a13.voiceContent: Snow this big only falls a few times a year. If I miss it, I'll have to wait until next year to run my experiments, so please give me some space. Ah-Ahchooo! ...Yes, I know, I should wear more layers...

252e2b92de25ea0e.voiceContent: The sun is already out? Oh, ah, okay! Just one last experiment, and then we can get some rest. Last one, I promise...

7a072afc61dc2f3e.voiceContent: Good morning. Did you sleep well? According to research, not getting a good night's sleep can have detrimental effects on your cognition and stamina. What? I'm always up working through the night? Yeah, I know... Can't be helped I guess...

0b57bc080600441a.voiceContent: Waaaaa! No, stay back, don't come over here! No, no, it's nothing personal — it's just that this experiment is highly volatile and might cause an explosion.

2bcea50f4fa804c4.voiceContent: Good evening. Please wait a moment. Experiment 905 has actually produced two light excretions, which, for clarity's sake, should be labeled No. 1033 and No. 1035 respectively... Right, now, what did you need me for?

74f70aa9e0b3550c.voiceContent: No need to wait up for me. Please, get some sleep. Something bothering you? Oh, don't worry about me — I'm right at the end of my experiment. I promise I won't stay up late again...

d7452fe572a71f4c.voiceContent: Oh, you, ahh... noticed. My ears are a hereditary feature... quite different from everyone else's. So, I try to hide them with my hair as much as possible.

25f0315d3d590061.voiceContent: I'm curious to know about your background. I was wondering... could I perhaps... observe you for a while? I'll be silent, and I won't interfere with what you're doing. Would... that be okay?

d96d930f6d833203.voiceContent: Bio-alchemy, when compared with creation, places more emphasis on transformation. Finding those little secrets that living creatures have and scaling them up, combining them — the results are always such a surprise. Life really is fascinating. Just how much do we really know?

462949dc9443931d.voiceContent: I... um... really don't know how to act around new people. Everyone's personality is different, as are the things they care about. If I slip up and say the wrong thing, I'll offend someone, or sound impolite... Talking is hard, so much harder than alchemy.

555f9de808343899.voiceContent: My Vision is my most important research tool. Hmm? Why, without it I'd be unable to proceed with most of my elemental research. Combat? Oh, I suppose I use it for that too when I'm out in the field looking for materials.

97b630af202d1a18.voiceContent: This room is where I keep all the bones I've collected. On the table on the left we have lizards, frogs, and grass carp. To the front we have the bones of a wild boar, and then over there in the right corner is a hilichurl... Oh, don't be nervous, nothing to be afraid of. They're really quite cute once you get used to them.

871ce962c1f0225a.voiceContent: If you look closely, you'll notice that the Mist Flowers I've planted here are all different. This one is the most powerful, this one blooms the longest... This one? Oh, this one is project 3, version 17, enlargement trial. Its defining trait is that... it's a bit larger.

da2658c3ca4074dd.voiceContent: She's... a very willing helper, I can't deny that. It's just... she makes me a little anxious is all. One time, she saw three boxes of materials stacked just outside my laboratory door, and proceeded to move them inside for me. A nice gesture, but the thing is... I'd only just finished putting them outside...

aebf2151697fee0e.voiceContent: Jean has put her into solitary confinement so many times, but every time she's let out it's not long before she's back in trouble. *sigh* Something tells me she hasn't done much introspection. I told her I'd make her a bouncing, dancing Jumpy Dumpty that is also safe — but to date there are still a lot of problems with the design.

f2e5543869509dbb.voiceContent: I don't dare talk to Master Jean that much, because she's so strict. I know she's a good person and all — I know that, I do — but... I still find her scary. I don't tend to bother her, and even when I have to... I ask Albedo to go on my behalf.

829ce3143f4cdbad.voiceContent: Talent? Let's hypothesize that he and I were to perform the same research — I'd still spend my whole life playing catch up. But, my studying bio-alchemy has nothing to do with evading his line of research, we just happen to have different interests and dreams — nothing more.

9cb4bc7fff7c7d36.voiceContent: I'm curious as to why her doll is called Baron Bunny, it clearly has nothing to do with a rabbit at all. Oh, the headband makes it look like it has rabbit ears you say? Hmm... That's heavily reliant on the rabbit stereotype, is it not? Many rabbits' ears are floppy.

653dff4ae31ad6e4.voiceContent: I take it you're referring to the book series, Flowers for Princess Fischl? Indeed, the world the author came up with is very creative. If only I could go see it with my own eyes. Oh, you're referring to Fischl herself? I am... doubtful that she could really take me there.

80e67340b69c3320.voiceContent: She really seems to know a great deal. She's obviously never seen my research, and yet on so many occasions she's given me advice on that which is most core to my studies. Just how does she know? Is it observation, or is it ratiocination?

7a818d06cefc226a.voiceContent: Oh... I know he likes to joke, and isn't trying to make fun of me, but I often struggle to work out which parts of what he says are the truth and which parts are jokes. So whenever he talks to me, the outcome is usually one of two things morbid embarrassment or unbearable awkwardness.

5143450d4974c02a.voiceContent: As his assistant I learn so much each and every day. What's key is not his existing knowledge, but his talented way of thinking. No matter how complex the task at hand, his way of thinking ensures he gets to the bottom of it, and is able to explain it thoroughly. His methodologies are amazing... to me, it's where alchemy meets art.

6f7a131e9705fe5e.voiceContent: You... want to know more about me? You... must have an interest in bio-alchemy, then? Whatever you ask, I will be sure to give you the most precise answer possible. Oh, it really is me specifically that you are interested in? I'm... ahh... oh. I'm at a loss for words.

cd1c2126c87e1301.voiceContent: The essence of research is the process of finding the answer. Sometimes, working through that process can be tedious, but every time I see the cumulative result of my efforts... I know that I'm doing what I love.

740a4730446b9f00.voiceContent: When I was little, I had two good friends — we kept nothing from each other. I thought I knew everything about them, but then... stuff happened, and we grew distant. As for where they are now, what they're doing, whether or not they remember me... I have no idea. Even though we were best friends, things still turned out this way.

2d62d4f4d4bc5653.voiceContent: Let me tell you a little secret, something I've never told anyone. The purpose behind my research is to create my own wonderland. Yes... just like the ones in fairy tales. The kind where all your dreams come true and you live happily ever after. Hehe, it's childish, isn't it? But, I still believe in fairy tales.

abdba2fd184a0c4a.voiceContent: If you're busy, please don't let me stand in the way of progress. ...You're not busy? Really? It's fine, I—I get that you have stuff to do. I'm already quite used to working alone. ...You're truly not busy? I—In that case, I don't suppose you could help me with a few things? Or, you know, we could sit and chat about... stuff.

2527697c82e9699a.voiceContent: I like things that look orderly. See? All of my research notes are compiled in notebooks of the exact same thickness. All my potions are lined up according to effect and hue— Wha—What!? What is this purple potion doing here!? Sorry, I—I need to reassess the order of these potions!

3a1711486ba4f88f.voiceContent: I wonder... What is it that you do in your free time? Every time I get a break, I can never find anything to do. I just find myself staring off into space. Time goes by so quickly when I'm experimenting, so how is it that when I'm not doing anything, the days all feel like years...

bafe27b6316b57bd.voiceContent: I extract the nectar from Sweet Flowers to make candy. When I get stuck in a rut, I just pop one in my mouth and my focus returns. Retaining optimal blood sugar levels during research is essential.

0aba1d06193007df.voiceContent: Once I came to understand more about bio-alchemy, I stopped eating mushrooms. You're no doubt aware? Mushrooms grow on that which has died, which in turn makes me think of other such things, and my appetite just disappears... Blergh...

890b78ba55695a8a.voiceContent: So delectable! Time to finish my research now that I feel at my best!

eee30124c7fcfcd0.voiceContent: I must admit, this tastes a lot better than my healthy meals. Time for me to make some modifications to my diet.

15ccb09938155344.voiceContent: Sorry, I have some... reservations about this dish.

f648de44ba1dfdeb.voiceContent: Happy birthday! I've been running experiments for months, and finally I can give you this potion. It will allow you to relive your most beautiful memories of the past year. I call it Bio-Potion No. 3916. Huh? No, no, not 3196, it's 3916!

e73861adc02c0669.voiceContent: Finally! A breakthrough in my bio-alchemy research.

76f433a4f3dfc006.voiceContent: This trip has allowed me to gather a good number of materials. Thank you, I'll be sure to put them to good use.

f8b1959cb07febef.voiceContent: Recently during my experiments, I've found myself suddenly wondering when I'll next get to go on an adventure with you. So strange... Why do you think that is? I need to do some scientific investigation to find out.

ca87c795bd5d1864.voiceContent: I have such an abundant array of research materials now! To spend any more time on me would... would really be a waste of your time! At least... let me use my bio-alchemy to make you up some kind of gift!

e35d6feffa5fe24e.voiceContent: The role of a scout is a hazardous one, and Ms. Eula throws herself into danger all too easily. So, I made a reconnaissance device for her, so that she wouldn't have to infiltrate enemy camps herself. But Ms. Eula has such an imposing manner, she really puts me on edge, and... I was so nervous that I accidentally left out a few important details while explaining how to use it... As a result, there was an accident...Ah, what should I do... I hope she won't hold a grudge against me...

278f002ef8a0e9ec.voiceContent: To be honest, I was a little afraid when we first met, because you don't talk much... I thought I must have offended you somehow. But then as time went on, I discovered you're really easy to get along with. Hehe, just an unexpected outcome of my observations.

91e32e146cd83683.voiceContent: I heard it was you that dealt with the Stormterror issue. No doubt it was a dangerous fight — it's a good thing you came out unscathed. I was ahh... also wondering — did Stormterror happen to drop anything during the fight? You know, a scale, some skin — even just a little would be fine. There are some tests I'd like to run...

cd6f6c465687c341.voiceContent: So delectable! Time to finish my research now that I feel at my best!

4bd4be646cf431c7.voiceContent: I must admit, this tastes a lot better than my healthy meals. Time for me to make some modifications to my diet.

e4a6e8226529a22d.voiceContent: Sorry, I have some... reservations about this dish.

0f196b495bfc0d05.voiceContent: I need to learn to improvise more...

77ac4ab8a664bcf4.voiceContent: Okay, new tactics this time... I think it should work.

e5cd45969c556cd7.voiceContent: Phew, Genius Invokation TCG's rule set is very complex... I need to make some more systematic notes...

286df5fd97095394.voiceContent: This tactic is... hmm, basic. But with some further iteration and fine-tuning, maybe...

ed5fc9895ccbdb04.voiceContent: Great! All that strategizing paid off.

2488d89ff424016b.voiceContent: Whew, a promising result. Now to write up my notes.

8bb1dc169ef527c8.voiceContent: I need to find and eliminate my errors...

5f46bf3a2295cf2b.voiceContent: Hmm... got it! Okay, I have a game plan.

631a18af787c5cb7.voiceContent: I have gained a tactical advantage.

97abd096ab9f3e4d.voiceContent: This'll minimize my average error rate!

d53322aec083bf5e.voiceContent: I'll have to adjust my strategy.
